text: Tara balabe -- ''tomara'i saba mahima! Eti amadera jan'ya samicina naya ye tomake bada diye amara an'yan'ya abhibhabakadera grahana karaba. Kintu tumi tadera o tadera pitrpurusadera bhogasambhara diyechile, pariname tara bhule giyechila sabadhana-bani, phale tara hayechila ekati binasta jati.â€™â€™
